text: "The Narcissist" is a 2023 song by Blur and is the leading single from their ninth studio album The Ballad of Darren. It went to number 81 in the United Kingdom, number 33 on the Top 40 hot singles chart in New Zealand and number 34 on the Billboard Rock Airplay. It was their first single since 2015. ==References== Category:2023 songs Category:Blur (band) songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Indie pop songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Arena pop songs
title: The Narcissist (song)
